entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
